languages.text: "Не стоит. Он никуда не делся, лишь... эволюционировал. Мои слова — и его слова тоже".
"There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."
languages.original_text: "Не стоит. Он никуда не делся, лишь... эволюционировал. Мои слова — и его слова тоже".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere; he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere; he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “没必要怀念他。他并没有离开，他只是……进化了。我此刻说出的话，也同样是他想说的话。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: “没必要怀念他。他并没有离开，他只是……进化了。我此刻说出的话，也同样是他想说的话。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No es necesario. No ha ido a ninguna parte, solo ha... evolucionado. Mis palabras son también las suyas».
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: «No es necesario. No ha ido a ninguna parte, solo ha... evolucionado. Mis palabras son también las suyas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その必要はない。彼はどこにも行っていない。ただ…進化しただけだ。私の言葉は彼の言葉でもある」
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: 「その必要はない。彼はどこにも行っていない。ただ…進化しただけだ。私の言葉は彼の言葉でもある」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist nicht nötig. Er ist nicht fort, er hat sich lediglich ... weiterentwickelt. Meine Worte sind auch seine Worte."
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht nötig. Er ist nicht fort, er hat sich lediglich ... weiterentwickelt. Meine Worte sind auch seine Worte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Pas nécessairement. Il n'a pas disparu, il a simplement... évolué. Mes paroles sont aussi les siennes. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: « Pas nécessairement. Il n'a pas disparu, il a simplement... évolué. Mes paroles sont aussi les siennes. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

languages.text: "Buna gerek yok. Hiçbir yere gitmedi, yalnızca... Evrim geçirdi. Benim sözlerim onun da sözleridir."
languages.original_text: "There is no need. He has not gone anywhere, he has merely... evolved. My words are his words as well."

traits.locale_text: "Buna gerek yok. Hiçbir yere gitmedi, yalnızca... Evrim geçirdi. Benim sözlerim onun da sözleridir."
